thread.title: Ed in Virginia
thread.title_full: willisorchards.com reviewed by Ed in Virginia

author: Ed in Virginia
title: Ed in Virginia
text: I have placed four (4) orders for 7'-8' tall trees (Paw Paws, Walnuts, Pecan, Pears, Apples) with Willis Orchards Co. during the past three years. The trees were exactly as described and delivered on time. The trees had very large caliper trunks and healthy root systems. Willis Orchards provide exact shipping & delivery information so that I was able to have the planting sites prepared the day before the arrival of the trees. The trees are all doing very well in Virginia. I have purchased several trees from other vendors for over 20 years and Willis Orchards clearly provides the best quality and value that I have ever seen. I am already planning my next purchase from Willis Orchards for the next season. Willis Orchards is definitely 10 STARS!
